title: What to See, Read and Listen To During the Holidays
sub_head: From Mariah Carey to ‘Wonder Woman,’ the entertainment season brings with it a host of options to enjoy from home
body:
Live-performances may be canceled and many theaters closed, but there are still an array of fresh holiday entertainment options to enjoy over the next month. The WSJ distills the movies, music, podcasts and books to help you enjoy the season from home.

From ‘Wonder Woman’ to movies filled with A-Listers like Meryl Streep, Nicole Kidman, Chadwick Boseman and Tom Hanks, the holiday movie season is on
